Yesterday, the largest box I have ever received arrived, and inside it; a precious beseler 23c iii-xl - the beginnings of a new darkroom (since I haven't been able to go to the Bushwick community darkroom since moving to Beacon) https://t.co/j9VRoEHuy1
now that I have been paid to watch politics, i no longer can watch politics unless someone is paying for it, those are the rules
If you aren’t doing everything differently from the way you did it in 2016 you haven’t learned your lesson – if you can’t figure it out, sit back and let someone else try something new

So many people saw 2016 and thought “woah! we did not expect or plan for this at all” and then they were like “okay now we know this can happen though so we will carry on in exactly the same way with that knowledge and now I have no more blind spots”
